## Notation

$R^o$ --- observed recipient proportion. \
$D^o$ --- observed donor proportion. \
$R$ --- true recipient proportion. \
$D$ --- true donor proportion. \
$\theta$ --- relative fitness parameter. \
$\kappa$ --- parameter associated with the variance of $R$. \ $Var(R)=\frac{1}{\kappa(\kappa+1)}$

## Model

\begin{align*}
D_{i}^{o} &\sim N(D_i, 0.05^2) \\
R_{i}^{o} &\sim N(R_i, 0.05^2) \\
R_i &\sim \text{Beta}(\mu_i \kappa, (1 - \mu_i)\kappa) \\
\mu_i &= \frac{D_i}{D_i + (1 - D_i)e^\theta}
\end{align*}
